changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS person ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, language VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT current_timestamp NOT NULL, deleted_at timestamp without time zone, updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT current_timestamp NOT NULL );
